properties.entry: SELECT GOODS_ID, SELLER_NO, CATEGORY_M, TITLE, STATUS, SELL_PRICE, VIEW_COUNT, P_EXPLANE, ENROLL_DATE, LOVEIT, RETURN_PD, LOCATION_T, PRODUCT_STATUS FROM PRODUCT P JOIN USER_NO ON (SELLER_NO = USER_NO) WHERE STATUS = '판매중' ORDER BY GOODS_ID DESC
INSERT INTO PRODUCT ( GOODS_ID, SELLER_NO, CATEGORY_M, TITLE, SELL_PRICE, VIEW_COUNT, P_EXPLANE, ENROLL_DATE, LOCATION_T, PRODUCT_STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_GOODSID.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
